overview.en: Lucky planet chain (LPC) aims to become a one-stop chain game platform where the metaverse meets DeFi and Socialfi. Through its own built-in ecological aggregator, it is used for multi-functional trading ecology such as gamefi, NFT trading platform, and social networking. These features will be available on multiple chains such as TRON, Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, etc.
overview.zh: Lucky planet chain（LPC）旨在成为元宇宙和DeFi、Socialfi相遇的一站式链游平台。通过自身内置的生态聚合器用于gamefi、NFT交易平台、社交等多功能交易生态。这些功能将在TRON、Ethereum、Binance Smart Chain等多个链上提供。
